column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Fresh ingredients on this deep dish!   This restaurant was recommended by a Chicago friend and it did not disappoint!  We ordered the sausage pizza and added more garlic
column2: basil and tomatoes (not sundried). Delicious!  We had tried another local Chicago deep dish pizzeria and there is no comparison!  Lou Malnati's is a must for deep dish.  Be prepared to wait. TIP: They'll let you in advance
column4: so your pizza will be baking while you wait!
